word_mean: 尸胺：一种恶臭味的含氮碱，为赖氨酸脱羧而成的五甲烯二胺(戊二胺)NH2·CH2(CH2)3CH2·NH2。系经细菌特别是弧菌(Vibrio)的作用在腐烂的蛋白质中产生

sentence.Network_en: One major source of odor is the organic amine cadaverine ( image the origin of that name ).
sentence.Network_cn: 一个主要的气味来源是有机 胺 类一尸 胺.

sentence.Network_en: Tryptamine, cadaverine and histamine produced during beer brewing could improve beer flavor and beer quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 啤酒中常见的生物胺有酪胺;啤酒酿造过程产生适量色胺、尸胺、组胺,能改善啤酒风味,提高啤酒质量.
